about.description:
ASCII art is also known as "computer text art".
It involves the smart placement of typed special characters or
letters to make a visual shape that is spread over multiple lines of text.
ART is a Python lib for text converting to ASCII art fancy.

ASCII art is also known as "computer text art".
It involves the smart placement of typed special characters or
letters to make a visual shape that is spread over multiple lines of text.
ART is a Python lib for text converting to ASCII art fancy.

name: ascii-art
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ascii-art" %}
{% set version = "6.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/art/art-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6ab3031e3b7710039e73497b0e750cadfe04d4c1279ce3a123500dbafb9e1b64

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=2.7
  run:
    - python >=2.7

test:
  imports:
    - art
  commands:
    - pip check
    - python -m art test2
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://www.ascii-art.site
  summary: ASCII Art Library For Python
  dev_url: https://github.com/sepandhaghighi/art
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    ASCII art is also known as "computer text art".
    It involves the smart placement of typed special characters or
    letters to make a visual shape that is spread over multiple lines of text.
    ART is a Python lib for text converting to ASCII art fancy.
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - thewchan
    - sepandhaghighi
    - sadrasabouri
